content.html: My hobby: running container scanners on containers provided by security vendors. Today's victim, Cloud Workstations (just announced today by Google): cloud.google.com/workstations/d… When you start the environment, it shows you the URL to the container running all your software!
content.value:
My hobby: running container scanners on containers provided by security vendors.

Today's victim, Cloud Workstations (just announced today by Google): cloud.google.com/workstations/d…

When you start the environment, it shows you the URL to the container running all your software!
